text: The 1983 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy was the fifth edition of the Hockey Champions Trophy men's field hockey tournament. It took place from 28 October - 4 November in Karachi, Pakistan. ==Tournament== ===Final table=== ===Results=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250| Team One !width=250| Team Two !width=80| Score |- |Netherlands || Australia ||2-5 |- |India || West Germany ||1-2 |- |Pakistan ||New Zealand ||3-0 |- |Pakistan ||India ||2-0 |- |Netherlands || West Germany ||1-2 |- |New Zealand || Australia ||1-1 |- |West Germany || New Zealand ||3-1 |- |Pakistan || Australia ||0-2 |- |India || Netherlands ||2-1 |- |Netherlands ||New Zealand ||4-2 |- |Australia || India ||3-3 |- |Pakistan || West Germany || 1-3 |- |India || New Zealand ||2-1 |- | Pakistan || Netherlands ||2-3 |- |Australia ||West Germany||3-1 |} ===Winning Squad=== == References== C C 1983 Category:Champions Trophy (field hockey)
title: 1983 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy
